subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The retirement plan for Roger Clemens is always written on an Etch-a-Sketch, with a shake-and-erase option to indulge his vacillating heart, with knobs to adjust to his indecisive mind.
snippet: The retirement plan for Roger Clemens is always written on an Etch-a-Sketch, with a shake-and-erase option to indulge his vacillating heart, with knobs to adjust to his indecisive mind.
